name: Archivist
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller & privately ask a yes/no question about the Demon's ability.

jinxes.reason: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
The Archivist receives arbitrary information until the Summoner creates a Demon

name: Astronomer
ability: Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller to privately learn why they made a decision, but not what it was.

firstNightReminder: Do not inform the Demon or their Minions who each other are.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Au’Wre. They point to a number of players equal to the number of in-play Minions: indicate which of the people they chose are Minions. If all of them are, place the "Found Minions" reminder.
name: Au’Wre
ability: Each night*, guess your Minions: learn which are correct. If all are, good learns this, and must kill evil today or lose. [Evil don’t learn each other]

jinxes.reason: If Au’Wre guesses the Ravenkeeper, they use their ability.
If Au’Wre guesses the Sage, they use their ability.
If Au’Wre guesses the Farmer, they use their ability.
If Au’Wre guesses the Steeplejack, they use their ability.
The Au’Wre doesn’t learn which player a Pranked minion chose.
If Au’Wre guesses the Local Hero, their known character dies.
Each time Au’Wre guesses a Minion for the first time, the King learns 1 alive character. If Au’Wre guesses the King, they lose their ability.
If Au’Wre guesses the King and the Choirboy is alive, they use their ability.
The first time Au’Wre guesses the Magician, they learn the Magician is a Minion.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play. Evil starts knowing if Au’Wre is in play.
If Au’Wre correctly guesses the Minions, then nobody is executed & a Mayor is alive, the Mayor's team wins.
Au’Wre guesses on the first night, but its guesses go through 1 night later. If they guess correctly, the Duelist learns this, otherwise the Duelist learns nothing.
Au’Wre only learns the Marionette after the Marionette is guessed.
If Au’Wre is executed and the Mastermind ability activates, it is announced Au’Wre guessed their Minions.
The Pit-Hag can not create an Au’Wre.
If Au’Wre is in play, the Spy only sees half of the Grimoire.
If Au’Wre is in play, the Widow only sees half of the Grimoire.
The Psychopath learns when Au’Wre guesses them and can only kill after this. Once Au’Wre guesses their Minions, the Psychopath dies regardless of Roshambo result if executed.
The Vizier's existence is not announced until after they are guessed. They can not execute until they are revealed.
If the Hatter dies & Au’Wre chooses to become another Demon, Minions & Demons learn each other. The Demon can’t choose to become Au’Wre when the Hatter dies.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
If the Summoner creates an Au’wre, the Storyteller chooses who they are.

name: Beachcomber
ability: Each day, visit the Storyteller to learn a fact no other on-script Townsfolk could learn with their ability.

jinxes.reason: The Beachcomber can learn information the Savant can learn.
The Beachcomber can learn information the Artist can learn.
The Beachcomber can learn information the Amnesiac can learn. If the Amnesiac is in play, the Beachcomber can not learn what they can with their current ability.

otherNightReminder: If the Nominator reminder is placed, inform the Cardinal of their new alignment: the opposite of the person who nominated them.
name: Cardinal
ability: If nominated, tonight, you become the allignment opposite to whoever nominated you.

firstNightReminder: During the Minion info step, inform the Minions the Cawthane is in play. They point to players: move the "Coronation" reminder besides the player who got the most votes.  Replace their token with the Cawthane's, and inform them they are now the evil Cawthane.
otherNightReminder: The Cawthane points to a player. That player dies.
name: Cawthane
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [+0 or +1 Outsiders, Minions choose who you are.]

jinxes.reason: When Minions choose who Cawthane is, they also choose the Marionette. If there are no other Minions, the Storyteller chooses Cawthane and the Marionette.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
The Lunatic may draw a good character from the bag, and be told they became Cawthane on the first night.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
If the Balloonist was chosen to be Cawthane, +1 Outsider was added.
If the Huntsman was chosen to be Cawthane, the Damsel was added. If the Damsel is chosen to be the Cawthane & a Huntsman is in play, a good player becomes the Damsel.
An evil Townsfolk is only created if the Bounty Hunter is still in play after the Cawthane acts.
The Soldier is not safe from becoming Cawthane.
If the Choirboy is in play, the King can not be chosen to be the Cawthane.

firstNightReminder: Show the Cryptid part of their ability. Show the good player marked as "Knows" the other part of the ability. If appropriate, run the custom ability.
otherNightReminder: Run the custom ability of the Cryptid.
name: Cryptid
ability: You only know part of your ability. 1 good player knows the rest of it.

otherNightReminder: If the "Betrays Tonight" reminder is placed, inform the Deserter of their new alignment. Remove the "Betrays Tonight" reminder.
name: Deserter
ability: The 1st time a dead player votes, become their alignment tonight.

jinxes.reason: The Deserter becomes the alignment of the first player to nominate while dead.

firstNightReminder: Show the Esper the Grimoire. They select a character, a reminder, and a player by placing their Character, Reminder, and Player reminders by them. Wake the Demon; show them the marked character, reminder token, and point to the marked player.
otherNightReminder: Show the Esper the Grimoire. They select a character, a reminder, and a player by placing their Character, Reminder, and Player reminders by them. Wake the Demon; show them the marked character, reminder token, and point to the marked player.
name: Esper
ability: Each night (even when dead), you see the Grimoire, then choose 1 character, 1 reminder & 1 player: the Demon is shown all 3.

jinxes.reason: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
The Alchemist can not have the Esper ability.
When the Esper sees the Grimoire, the Demon and Magician’s character tokens are removed.
If the Poppy Grower is in play, the Esper does not see the Grimoire until the Poppy Grower dies.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Esper ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.
Until the 3rd night, the Esper's information is sent to the Summoner.

otherNightReminder: The Executioner shakes their head no or indicates a number from 0 to 2. If they indicate a number, mark that many players with "Dead". No-one else dies tonight.
name: Executioner
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose 0, 1, or 2: exactly that many players will die tonight (the Storyteller decides who).

firstNightReminder: The Falconer points to a character on their characteer sheet: mark a player with that character with the "Chosen" reminder if the character is in play, or mark the Falconer with "Not in play" if it isn't. Send the Falconer back to sleep.
otherNightReminder: Increment the Falconer's number by 1. You may choose to wake the Falconer (if it's 4, you must): show them which player has the character they chose. Remove all Falconer reminders. Then, the Falconer points to a character on their characteer sheet: mark a player with that character with the "Chosen" reminder if the character is in play, or mark the Falconer with "Not in play" if it isn't. Send the Falconer back to sleep.
name: Falconer
ability: On your 1st night, choose a character. 1-4 nights later, learn who that character is (or that it's not in play, then choose another.

firstNightReminder: The Demon chooses a player tonight, unlike normal: mark that player with "Dies in 1 night". Wake the Fencer. Show them the player marked with the "Dies in 1 night" reminder. Replace that reminder at the end of today; that player dies when the Demon chooses.
otherNightReminder: Do not kill the player the Demon chooses; instead, mark them with "Dies in 1 night". Wake the Fencer. Show them the player marked with the "Dies in 1 night" reminder.  Replace that reminder at the end of today; that player dies when the Demon chooses.
name: Fencer
ability: The Demon attacks on the 1st night, but its’ victims die 1 night later. Each night, you learn who the Demon chose.

jinxes.reason: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Al-Hadikhia's choices are announced 1 night later.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

otherNightReminder: If the Firebrand's "Incited" reminder is placed, wake them. They choose a player: show them that player's character. Send the Firebrand to sleep. Place the "No ability" reminder by the Firebrand.
name: Firebrand
ability: If you nominate & execute the first person executed, that night (even if dead), choose a player: learn their character.

jinxes.reason: If the Firebrand makes the first nomination in a day and survives (once), they use their ability tonight.

name: Grandmaster
ability: Once per game, visit the Storyteller to privately learn who your most important ally is, but not why they're important.

firstNightReminder: Show the Huli Jing 5 out-of-play characters: note which ones using a notes app. Then, the Huli Jing chooses one of them: mark that as their "Current Form". Until dusk, run the Huli Jing as though they were that character, and you may have them register as though they were that character & alignment.
otherNightReminder: The Huli Jing chooses one of the 5 characters they were shown at the start of the game: mark that as their "Current Form". Until dusk, run the Huli Jing as though they were that character, and you may have them register as though they were that character & alignment.
name: Huli Jing
ability: You start knowing 5 out-of-play characters. Each night, choose 1 of them: until dusk, gain its’ ability & you might register as it would.

jinxes.reason: The Huli Jing can not gain the Heretic ability.
The Huli Jing can not gain the Politician ability.
If the Huli Jing gains the Cult Leader ability, they can not turn Good.
If the Huli Jing gains the Goon ability, they can not turn Good.
If the Huli Jing gains the Deserter ability, they can not turn Good.
If the Huli Jing gains the Cardinal ability, they can not turn Good.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Inysyns and show them a number: note that number. On the night before that day, mark the Inysnys with "Judgement Day": if they would lose today, they win instead.
otherNightReminder: The Inysyns points to a player: that player dies.
name: Inysyns
ability: You start knowing a day. On that day (from dawn to dusk) if good would win, evil wins instead. Each night*, choose a player: they die.

jinxes.reason: During the Day of Judgement, they are safe from the Witch.
During the Day of Judgement, they are safe from the Psychopath.
The Vizier knows the Day of Judgement and can not execute the Inysyns on that day.

otherNightReminder: The Ketos points to a player and a good character on their character sheet; if they're correct, replace the number reminder token in the Grimoire with one less, or "The End" if it's 1.
name: Ketos
ability: After the 6th day, everyone else dies. Each night*, guess a player & a good character: if right, the end comes one day sooner.

jinxes.reason: The 1st time Ketos guesses the Ravenkeeper’s character, the Ravenkeeper uses their ability
The 1st time Ketos guesses the Sage’s character, the Sage uses their ability
The 1st time Ketos guesses the Farmer’s character, the Farmer uses their ability
The 1st time Ketos guesses the Steeplejack’s character, the Steeplejack uses their ability
If Ketos guesses the Local Hero’s character, the Local Hero’s known character dies.
If Ketos correctly guesses a Monk-protected-player, the end does not come sooner.
If Ketos correctly guesses an Innkeeper-protected-player, the end does not come sooner.
If Ketos correctly guesses a Warden-protected-player, the end does not come sooner.
If Ketos is in play, then on the 3rd night onwards, the King learns 1 alive character. If Ketos correctly guesses the King, the King loses their ability.
If Ketos correctly guesses the King & the Choirboy is alive, the Choirboy learns the Demon.
On the day before the end, if nobody is executed while the Mayor is alive, the Mayor’s team wins.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Ketos learns that a Lunatic is in play, but not who they are.
If the Hatter dies on or after Day 6, the Demon can not become Ketos.
If Ketos is in play, the Spy learns all in-play characters instead of seeing the Grimoire.
If Ketos is in play, the Widow learns all in-play characters instead of seeing the Grimoire. The Widow chooses a character to poison instead of a player.
Ketos learns who the Good Twin is and can not guess their character.

firstNightReminder: During the first night, wake the Local Hero and show them the character token marked with “Seen”. Send the Local Hero to sleep.
otherNightReminder: If the Local Hero dies at night due to an evil player’s ability, the character marked with "Seen" dies too.
name: Local Hero
ability: You start knowing an in-play opposing character. If an evil ability kills you, that character dies too.

jinxes.reason: If Leviathan is in play and the Local Hero is executed, the character they know dies tonight.
If Riot nominates and kills the Local Hero, an evil player also dies.

firstNightReminder: Each night, wake the Miasma. They either shake their head no or nod yes. If they shake their head, put the Miasma to sleep. If they nod, place the “Shrouded” reminder in the Grimoire, and mark the Miasma with “No ability”. While the “Shrouded” reminder is placed, all Townsfolk are poisoned, and additionally must receive false information if they get any information.
otherNightReminder: Each night, wake the Miasma. They either shake their head no or nod yes. If they shake their head, put the Miasma to sleep. If they nod, place the “Shrouded” reminder in the Grimoire, and mark the Miasma with “No ability”. While the “Shrouded” reminder is placed, all Townsfolk are poisoned, and additionally must receive false information if they get any information.
name: Miasma
ability: Once per game, at night, choose that all Townsfolk are poisoned & get false information until dusk.

jinxes.reason: If the Alchemist has the Miasma ability, they are safe from themselves.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Mouldwarp, and show them their new character. Mark 1 of the Mouldwarp-Demon and the original Demon with the "Woke Last Night" reminder.
otherNightReminder: Do not wake any Demon marked with the "Woke Last Night" reminder. Place the "Woke Last Night" reminder by any Demons that did wake.
name: Mouldwarp
ability: On your 1st night, become an out-of-play Demon with this ability. Demons only wake to kill every other night (even if dead).

jinxes.reason: The Mouldwarp Demon registers as Mouldwarp to the Engineer.
The Mouldwarp Demon registers as Mouldwarp to the Pit-Hag.
If the Alchemist has the Mouldwarp ability, they lose it when they die. The Alchemist can not kill the evil Demon.
If the Mouldwarp would become Lil' Monsta, they immediately babysit instead.
If the Hatter dies, the Mouldwarp Demon can choose to become either a Demon or Minion. If a Demon, they keep the Mouldwarp ability.

firstNightReminder: Show the Obscrul their secret ability. Run that secret ability, if appropriate.
otherNightReminder: Run the Obscrul's secret ability.
name: Obscrul
ability: Only you know what your ability is. Once per game, the Archivist may publicly guess it: if right, you die. [+the Archivist]

jinxes.reason: If the Pit-Hag creates an Obscrul, an Archivist is also created (if not in play).
If the Hatter dies & the Demon becomes an Obscrul, an Archivist is created (if not in play).
If the Summoner creates an Obscrul, an Archivist is also created (if not in play).

name: Occultist
ability: You might be executed unless you are mad about learning something new every day. Once per game, when you visit the Storyteller, you learn a fact.

otherNightReminder: If the Pentient died today or tonight, wake the Demon. Show them the "This character affected you" token, and then the Penitent token. They shake their head or nod. If they nod, place the "Doubled End" reminder: they kill two players every night from now on.
name: Penitent
ability: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may change their ability to "Each night*, choose 2 players: they die."

jinxes.reason: If the babysitter chooses to change their ability, Minions no longer wake to decide the babysitter.
If the Penitent dies & Legion is in play, nothing happens.
If the Penitent is dead when the Summoner creates a Demon, they may choose that the Demon's ability is 'Each night*, choose 2 players: they die.'

name: Perfumer
ability: The 1st time an evil player is nominated & executed by another evil player, their Townsfolk neighbors are poisoned (even if dead).

jinxes.reason: Players who die by nomination register as being executed to the Perfumer.

otherNightReminder: The Prankster points to a player. Put them to sleep. If it's a Minion, mark that player with "Pranked", then wake that Minion and show them the "This character affected you" token and the Prankster token. All "Pranked" Minions choose a player; mark that player with "Demon Learns Tonight." Finally, wake the Demon, and point to each player marked "Demon learns tonight" in turn, and show them the corresponding character.
name: Prankster
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if a Minion, their ability becomes "Each night, choose a player: the Demon learns their character."

jinxes.reason: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
If the Vizier loses their ability, they learn this. If the Vizier is executed while they have their ability, their team wins.
Riot registers as a Minion to the Prankster.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

name: Silversmith
ability: On the final day, you decide who is executed (everyone learns this). If you die at night, another player might die instead.

jinxes.reason: If Riot is in play, the Silversmith does not use their ability unless only 3 players live on the final day.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Sleepwalker, and act as though they had the ability they think they do: secretly run the ability they actually have. Wake 1 Good player, and show them the Sleepwalker token.
name: Sleepwalker
ability: You think you’re a Townsfolk, but you have a different ability with the same choices. 1 good player knows you’re in play.

otherNightReminder: Count the number of "Voted" reminders placed. Show the Spice Trader that number. If you would show them 0, the Spice Trader becomes drunk.
name: Spice Trader
ability: Each night*, learn how many evil players voted today. If you would learn a 0, you become drunk.

jinxes.reason: f players eyes were closed during nominations, the Spice Trader learns which player received the most evil votes & how many they received.
Players who nominate & kill someone register as voting to the Spice Trader.

otherNightReminder: If the Steeplejack died tonight: the Steeplejack points to two characters with "You start knowing" in their ability's text: show the Steeplejack information those characters could learn.
name: Steeplejack
ability: If you die at night, you are woken to choose 2 "You start knowing" characters & get their info.

jinxes.reason: If Leviathan is in play and the Steeplejack is executed, they use their ability tonight.
If Riot nominates and kills the Steeplejack, they use their ability tonight.
If the Steeplejack dies at night & chooses Yaggababble, they may visit the Storyteller tomorrow to learn a hint towards the Yaggabable’s phrase. If not in play, this info is arbitrary.

otherNightReminder: The Surgeon either shakes their head no or points to a player: that is their "Patient". Tonight, if they would die, they live, and if they would survive the night, they die. The Surgeon can only do this twice.
name: Surgeon
ability: Twice per game, at night*, you may choose a living player: they live if they would die, and vice versa. The Demon cannot die this way.

otherNightReminder: The Tactician points to two players. Indicate which one you think that the Demon should kill tonight, if they had to kill one of those two.
name: Tactician
ability: Each night*, choose 2 living players: learn which one the Storyteller thinks it’d be better for the Demon to kill tonight.

jinxes.reason: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
The Tactician learns which player it’d be better for Riot to nominate and kill tomorrow.

otherNightReminder: The Terminus points to a player. That player dies.
name: Terminus
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. On the final day, the nominee with the least votes is executed instead.

jinxes.reason: If Terminus is alive and there are 3 players remaining, the Organ Grinder gains 666 votes unless they vote for themself.
The Vizier can't execute themselves or a dead player if 3 players live and Terminus is in play. If the Vizier executes a living player (not themselves), the other living player is executed instead.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Visionary and show them a piece of paper with a question written on it. Put them to sleep. Wake a good player and show them the same piece of paper. Put them to sleep.
name: Visionary
ability: You & a good player start knowing a question. Once per game, publicly answer it: if correct, your team wins.

jinxes.reason: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Visionary ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

otherNightReminder: The Warden either shakes their head no or nods yes. If they use their ability, show them each Demon on the script, one after another: the Warden points to a player for each one. Mark each player "Safe from Nth Demon" as apropriate. Mark the Warden with "No ability". Put the Warden to sleep.
name: Warden
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose 1 player for each on-script Demon: they are safe from that Demon.

jinxes.reason: If Leviathan nominates and executes the player the Warden chose, that player does not die.
If Riot nominates the player the Warden chose, that player does not die.

firstNightReminder: Point to both players marked as "Woven" in no particular order. Send the Weaver back to sleep.
name: Weaver
ability: You start knowing 2 players: 1 of them learned something true about the other tonight.

jinxes.reason: The Chambermaid learns if the Weaver wakes tonight or not, even though the Chambermaid wakes first.

name: Wight
ability: The 1st player you nominated while alive and voted for while dead are poisoned (even when dead).

jinxes.reason: If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Wight ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.
